Effect of Exchange Rate Changes: effect of exchange rate on cash and cash equivalents
effect of exchange rate on cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents

Net Cash from Financing Activities: cash provided by used in financing activities discontinued operations
net cash provided by used in financing activities
Other Financing Activities: excess tax benefit from share based compensation financing activities
proceeds from payments for other financing activities
Proceeds from Debt: proceeds from issuance of long term debt
proceeds from issuance of other long term debt
proceedsfrom issuanceof long term debtand term loans
Proceeds from Stock Issuance: proceeds from issuance or sale of equity
Repayment of Debt: proceeds from repayments of commercial paper
proceeds from repayments of lines of credit
Stock Repurchases: payments for repurchase of common stock

Acquisitions (net of cash acquired): business combination consideration transferred equity interests issued and issuable
business combination consideration transferred stock options and awards
payments to acquire businesses net of cash acquired
Capital Expenditures: payments to acquire property plant and equipment
Net Cash from Investing Activities: cash provided by used in investing activities discontinued operations
net cash provided by used in investing activities
Other Investing Activities: cash transfer related to spinoff transaction
proceeds from divestiture of businesses net of cash divested
Sales and Maturities of Investments: proceeds from sale maturity and collections of investments

Net Change in Cash: cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: increase decrease in accounts and other receivables
increase decrease in accounts payable and accrued liabilities
increase decrease in other operating capital net
increase decrease in prepaid deferred expense and other assets
Deferred Income Taxes: deferred income taxes and tax credits
Net Cash from Operating Activities: cash provided by used in operating activities discontinued operations
net cash provided by used in operating activities continuing operations
Net Income: income loss from discontinued operations net of tax
income loss from discontinued operations net of tax attributable to reporting entity
Other Non-Cash Items: gain loss on sale of business
Stock-Based Compensation: excess tax benefit from payments under share based compensation operating activities

__unmapped__: net cash provided by used in discontinued operations
payments for proceeds from longterm investments
payments for proceeds from short term investments
